name: WP TXT Sitemap
author: kuegy

sections.description:
WP TXT Sitemap creates an Text Sitemap For your website with auto ping search engines (Google and Bing). This Plugin may help Google quickly discover and index your website!

  • The first WP Plugin that creates TXT Sitemaps.
  • It does not conflict with any XML Sitemap Plugins OR any other SEO Plugins.
  • It works smoothly with Rank Math & Yoast SEO Plugin.

TXT Sitemap Content Options

  • Categories
  • Posts
  • Pages

Sitemap Auto Ping Options

  • Google
  • Bing

Updating Sitemap

The plugin auto generate sitemap.txt file once activated. and:

  • when any new post is published.
  • when settings saved.
sections.installation:
• From Plugins menu click Add New and search for WP TXT Sitemap.
  • Click Install Now and then Activate.
  • Go To Settings >> Reading for Plugin Options.
sections.faq:
How to install this plugin?

  • From Plugins menu click Add New and search for WP TXT Sitemap.
  • Click Install Now and then Activate.
  • Go To Settings >> Reading for Plugin Options.

How Can I access the sitemap?

After install the plugin, You will see a notice with sitemap.txt link. also you can append sitemap.txt to your site url, Example: sitemap.txt
sections.changelog:
1.2 (2020-03-23)

  • remove updating sitemap options and update it smoothly in background when post/page is created or updated.
  • remove include homepage option and include it at the top of sitemap by default.
  • Bug fixes and other minor improvements.

1.1 (2020-03-22)

  • Option added: When a new post is published.
  • Option removed: When the user access the admin area. (May harm large website)

1.0 (2020-03-20)

  • First Release
